title: Game Crashes

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I have been trying to practice league of legends with my team and I keep getting this error message when I try to load into a game. It also prompts me to send an error report. I don't understand why this is doing it now, cause it was working before and now it keeps crashing. Its very annoying cause I am completely missing my practice. I have tried everything to fix it, uninstall/reinstall, repair, and restarting my computer. Please help as soon as possible thank you.

replies.body:
This looks like a *really weird* Bugsplat error, but a Bugsplat error nonetheless. These errors are often the result of installation issues or problems system-side. Most of them can be addressed by working through our Bugsplat & Crash guide, which can be found [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if those steps helped.
